Title: Corrigendum to “Quality assessment of acoustic environment reproduction methods for cinematic virtual reality in soundscape applications” [Build. Environ. 149 (2019) 1–14] (Building and Environment (2019) 149 (1–14), (S036013231830739X), (10.1016/j.buildenv.2018.12.004))
